ygData.subject: Re: Staff and dagger weapons and damage
ygData.msgSnippet: ... dmg 9 means you can do anywhere from 1 to 19 dmg, you will hit for 19 more if you have a higher strength. ... yes, as far as i know. ... i use my runed
ygData.messageBody:
>
>Does the 9 mean it does 4 more max damage or is there some sort of
>proportion thing with strength factored in?

dmg 9 means you can do anywhere from 1 to 19 dmg, you will hit for 19 more
if you have a higher strength.

>Also, is the delay linear meaning a delay of 10 is twice as fast as a delay
>of 20?
>

yes, as far as i know.

>What do you guys use as weapons?

i use my runed totem staff, until i get something better (a good dagger,
which i would use if i get the skull of jhen tra, my next conquest). i am
also in the process of trying to find the quest to get one of the skull
headed staves. (anyone know this one, where you go to the guy in S. Ro? you
need to get the quest before you go to him, but i dont know where to get
the quest from).

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
